metadata.name: icarus, be thy guide 1
metadata.description:
august 3rd is my birthday.. i've come a long way. i'm 31, a professional artist, an avid yu-gi-oh player, a lover of disc golf, and a friend to many.. i've beta tested for MakersPlace in 2018.. beta tested for Cohart in 2021, and beta tested for Google in 2022.. life isn't what i expected. mostly centered around art as it's been the only thing consistent in my life. it's my own gift. something i'll continue to do for as long as i'm alive. this NFT is more than just something i've created for any hype. it's a timestamp, a time-capsule, as my path breaks forward.
i've started a gallery project that champions artists across many different channels of the internet, my friend's and i love what we do.. it's been going on for over a decade. we're going to continue doing this.. enjoy the journey.. this artwork is inspired from a game of disc golf played earlier.. and my curiosity of experimenting on an open edition for my birthday... enjoy the day.. with love, 
leeaux
https://leeaux.com
(i understand the irony of icarus being a guide to anyone. everyone is icarus.)
